label: 聖
本: Alms and Vagabonds: Buddhist Temples and Popular Patronage in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 1994
説明文: A term usually applied to an unorthodox religious figure who practiced ascetic regimens outside the auspices of monastic institutions. The term is a loose one. It can also designate a member of the regular clergy who had special charisma or was especially devoted to ascetic practice.
